item.description:
Hi All,

Hope everyone is doing well. Had a great time last week at brunch!

Anyway...

This weeks Sunday brunch will be @ 2PM at 29 Newbury Street. A few people requested that brunch be in the Back Bay again. You can checkout 29 Newbury by clicking below. Hope you like it.
http://www.29newbury....

This will be our last brunch in 2008 as I'll be traveling extensively as well as others in the group
during the next two months and nobody wanted to step up and be a leader.

Anyway... hope to see you at our last brunch in 2008! If not, have fun
over the holidays and keep in touch. And, Sunday brunch will be back in early 2009!!!!

Take care and cheers,
Mike
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be made under Mike/Meetup.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Brunch Anyone? (20 & 30 somethings for wkly brunch, etc... Meetup
